entry.title: RT with-heart: Humans create a lot of information messes It's only natural! We each have our own internal language we use to describe reality (our men...
entry.summary: RTâ€‚with-heart Humans create a lot of information messes It's only natural! We each have our own internal language we use to describe reality (our mental model) So even when we use the same words to describe something, we each _interpret_ those words to mean different things (a thread)
